level.text: An internal inquiry shall involve an examination by the Director of a possible violation of the Act, when the possible violation comes to the attention of the Director.
The Director may initiate an internal inquiry through the following sources:
Information obtained through the media; or
Within a reasonable time after examination of an internal inquiry, the Director shall determine whether to initiate a preliminary investigation.
